plot: A disillusioned twenty-something ventures to an island infested with murderous creatures to confront his insecurities and become a man.
title: Monster Island
plot_es: A disillusioned twenty-something ventures to an island infested with murderous creatures to confront his insecurities and become a man.
plot_en: A disillusioned twenty-something ventures to an island infested with murderous creatures to confront his insecurities and become a man.
